actions.description: Tanazir makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is addled by recursive thoughts, reducing its speed to 0 until the start of Tanazir's next turn.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Tanazir exhales a weakening equation in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (13d6) force damage and 45 (13d6) psychic damage and is weakened until the start of Tanazir's next turn. While weakened, it has disadvantage on the following rolls that rely on Strength: attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.
actions.name: Diminution Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Tanazir teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 100 feet of herself.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description:
Tanazir casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 24):
1/day each: divination, enlarge/reduce, mirage arcane (as an action), polymorph, scrying (as an action), seeming
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Tanazir uses Teleport, and each other creature within 20 feet of the space she left must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet closer to the center of that space and take 16 (3d10) force damage.
actions.name: Fold Space (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: Tanazir magically summons 1d4 fractal mascot|SCC|fractal mascots in unoccupied spaces she can see within 120 feet of herself. The fractals obey her commands and take their turns immediately after hers. While any of these fractals remain, attack rolls made against Tanazir have disadvantage. A summoned fractal disappears after 1 minute, when it or Tanazir dies, or when she uses this action again.
actions.name: Fractal Refraction (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: If Tanazir fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
